name: PLOTOKOSTE-DUSHEPLOT
description:
You take control of Nikita, creature that bounded to the Heart. Heart is beating. It consumes you. And corpses of other creatures. You need to feed the heart to survive in this harsh unforgiving world.

Controls: WASD - to move E - to pick corpse R - to drop corpse 1, 2, 3, 4 - use item in inventory slot Shift + 1, 2, 3, 4 - drop item from inventory slot Alt + 1, 2, 3, 4 - use item in inventory to combine with nearby item surroundings Usable items: Flesh - increases the rope length Bone - use on "stuck corpses" to remove wines Soul - throw to snatch corpses at distance (throw to a mouse position) Fleshbone (craftable only) - replenishes heart's health Soulflesh (craftable only) - increases speed of the character Soulfleshbone (craftable only) - adds 1 inventory slot (up to 4)
  • Blood puddles are there for a reason!
  • You don’t want to drag a body over a cracked tile, trust me.
  • The carnivore plants just want to get some hugs from you.

Nikita is NOT a shallow creature
